about_the_game:
Warplane Quest is a side-scrolling dogfighting game set in World War 1.

Join the Royal Flying Corps and become a legendary flying ace

  • Experience the story of a young RFC pilot and complete intense missions
  • Fight against the most dangerous aces of the World War 1
  • Unlock and upgrade authentic warplanes to gain an edge in the air



Engage a variety of air and ground enemies

  • Fight bosses in epic battles
  • Equip your machine with the optimal weapons for the given situation
  • Perform maneuvers to outsmart enemies



Explore beautiful levels full of dangers

  • Fight your way through procedurally generated battlefields
  • Collect valuable resources and items to upgrade your planes and skills

content_descriptors.notes: Splashes of blood after killing enemy soliders, seen from a distance.

detailed_description:
Join the Playtest on Our Discord!


About the Game

Warplane Quest is a side-scrolling dogfighting game set in World War 1.

Join the Royal Flying Corps and become a legendary flying ace

  • Experience the story of a young RFC pilot and complete intense missions
  • Fight against the most dangerous aces of the World War 1
  • Unlock and upgrade authentic warplanes to gain an edge in the air



Engage a variety of air and ground enemies

  • Fight bosses in epic battles
  • Equip your machine with the optimal weapons for the given situation
  • Perform maneuvers to outsmart enemies



Explore beautiful levels full of dangers

  • Fight your way through procedurally generated battlefields
  • Collect valuable resources and items to upgrade your planes and skills
name: Warplane Quest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: AMD Athlon X4 | Intel Core i5 4460
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 950 | AMD R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Warplane Quest tells the story of a young pilot destined to become a legendary flying ace. The game features intense dogfights, varied missions, beautiful landscapes and procedurally generated battlefields.
